title: Question:
author: hilariousandco
created_time: July 30, 2023, 06:56:05 PMLast edit: October 06, 2023, 03:07:15 PM by hilariousandco
content: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/KSI_vs_TBAQuoteMF & DAZN: X Series – The Prime Card will feature KSI vs Tommy Fury, an upcoming cruiserweight exhibition crossover boxing match contested between British YouTuber KSI and British boxer Tommy Fury for the MF cruiserweight title. The bout will take place at Manchester Arena in Manchester, England on 14 October 2023.[2]American YouTuber Logan Paul and an unannounced opponent will also headline the event as a double main event.KSI finally fighting someone of worth. I don't think he's as good as Jake so will probably struggle against Tommy. Rumours are the rest of the card is going to be stacked with the best of the youtuber boxers.

comments.author: Casdinyard
comments.body: I gotta give my vote to Tommy Fury here, KSI is good and all, for a content creator boxer and I'm not sure if his past bouts ever game him the opportunity and the experience to give him all the cajones needed to fight a professional boxer, and a lossless one at that. Although for sure, considering Tommy's 9 fight record KSI's bound to be able to do something on his end that may upturn the fight but I wouldn't really rely much on probabilities. And while my vote remains to be on Tommy's end I for sure know that KSI's not going down without a fight, and may even not go down considering he's built like a mini-tank lol. Really excited about this fight and I hope they are able to prepare generously for this since there's only 2 months left before the bout.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: hilariousandco on July 30, 2023, 06:56:05 PMQuoteMF & DAZN: X Series – The Prime Card will feature KSI vs Tommy Fury, an upcoming cruiserweight exhibition crossover boxing match contested between British YouTuber KSI and British boxer Tommy Fury for the MF cruiserweight title. The bout will take place at Manchester Arena in Manchester, England on 14 October 2023.[2]American YouTuber Logan Paul and an unannounced opponent will also headline the event as a double main event.KSI finally fighting someone of worth. I don't think he's as good as Jake so will probably struggle against Tommy. Rumours are the rest of the card is going to be stacked with the best of the youtuber boxers. Tommy Fury has proven how good he is by beating Jake Paul I don't think KSI has a chance at all what will interest the public here, it's going to be a lopsided match Tommy should be fighting real boxers if he wants to achieve what his brother Tyson achieved.His career as a boxer is going nowhere if he keeps fighting Youtubers because its a no-bearing match and it's not a stepping stone to have a good rank in boxing, we can understand if its a match again Jake Paul because the first match is close, but fighting KSI is like he is not taking his boxing seriously and if something goes wrong and KSI upsets him, he'll have something to regret.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: hilariousandco on July 30, 2023, 06:56:05 PMKSI finally fighting someone of worth. I don't think he's as good as Jake so will probably struggle against Tommy. Rumours are the rest of the card is going to be stacked with the best of the youtuber boxers. KSI is in trouble here if he doesn't prepare Tommy's last fight shows how he improved as a boxer I wonder why he turns to fighting celebrity Youtuber again, after fighting Jake Paul he prefers doing this stuff because he has no chance against the elite in the light heavyweight, I guess there's money doing this kind of fight, let's see who among the best Youtube boxer will be in the card Salt Papi has good boxing skill I hope he gets after his last fight which ended in a loss, I'm sure he will try to make a comeback.

comments.author: acroman08
comments.body: I feel like Tommy Furry will dominate this fight, I've seen KSI fight before and I agree that he is not as good as Jake Paul, on top of that Tommy Fury has more experience fighting Boxers than KSI which will definitely be an advantage for Tommy Fury.I wonder which youtube boxers are gonna be in the undercard fights.Quote from: hilariousandco on July 30, 2023, 06:56:05 PMQuoteAmerican YouTuber Logan Paul and an unannounced opponent will also headline the event as a double main event.have there been hints or rumours on who is Logan Paul going to fight?

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: Quote from: acroman08 on July 31, 2023, 01:24:17 PMI feel like Tommy Furry will dominate this fight, I've seen KSI fight before and I agree that he is not as good as Jake Paul, on top of that Tommy Fury has more experience fighting Boxers than KSI which will definitely be an advantage for Tommy Fury.I wonder which youtube boxers are gonna be in the undercard fights.Yes definitely he will dominate KSI because he is not as good as Jake Paul but he will give KSI a good fight for the benefit of the paying audience I'm sure they are going to hype this fight to gain more attention KSI should prepare for this fight he needs to shape Tommy is such a dangerous fighter I'm also waiting for the list of YouTubers so I can research how good these Youtubers are, Salt Papi deserves to be on the list.

comments.author: Yogee
comments.body: Quote from: Casdinyard on July 30, 2023, 07:37:58 PM[...] I for sure know that KSI's not going down without a fight, and may even not go down considering he's built like a mini-tank lol.Same here. KSI usually laughs at people in his videos so he doesn't want to be laughed at and trolled by critics and supporters if he goes down easily or completely dominated like a kid. He'll at least try to make it a respectable effort close to how Jake did.QuoteReally excited about this fight and I hope they are able to prepare generously for this since there's only 2 months left before the bout.Promoting the fight and all interviews will eat some of that preparation time unfortunately.

comments.author: Beparanf
comments.body: Tommy Fury is a real deal. He beats Jake in a convincing manner while KSI is inferior to Jake in terms of boxing skills. Tommy Fury boxing skills is superb like his brother. KSI is good if he is against same influencer boxer on his peers. I'm sure the odds on this match is very low for Fury which makes many gamblers do YOLO bet to KSI with juicy odds.

comments.author: hilariousandco
comments.body: I'm suspired KSI took this fight to be honest so fair play to him. I don't know whether he has delusional levels of self-confidence or what but I think Tommy is going to be many steps above him unless KSI has something new in his arsenal. The thing with KSI is he hasn't really had anything remotely close to a challenge yet. He's mostly just fought first timers some of which he practically just picked off the street.  I guess most people aren't expecting him to win so if he loses Jake Paul will probably be next. Quote from: acroman08 on July 31, 2023, 01:24:17 PMI feel like Tommy Furry will dominate this fight, I've seen KSI fight before and I agree that he is not as good as Jake Paul, on top of that Tommy Fury has more experience fighting Boxers than KSI which will definitely be an advantage for Tommy Fury.I wonder which youtube boxers are gonna be in the undercard fights.Quote from: hilariousandco on July 30, 2023, 06:56:05 PMQuoteAmerican YouTuber Logan Paul and an unannounced opponent will also headline the event as a double main event.have there been hints or rumours on who is Logan Paul going to fight?Dillan Danis is probably the prime candidate but I'm sure there's a few people they're trying to get and I'm sure they'll have a back up since he's notoriously flaky.

comments.author: bittraffic
comments.body: This is going to be a test of KSI's skill if he can defeat Tommy, he will have a say in what Paul can do. Pure courage. Obviously, it's Tommy who will come out as a winner. This is getting closer to having a fight between KSI vs Paul though.  Maybe they will be the next.Tommy also agrees after all he made a good tune-up against Paul. The Furys are really making sacks of money with the sports they chose while picking opponents lesser than them.

comments.author: acroman08
comments.body: Quote from: hilariousandco on July 31, 2023, 06:58:40 PMI'm suspired KSI took this fight to be honest so fair play to him. I don't know whether he has delusional levels of self-confidence or what but I think Tommy is going to be many steps above him unless KSI has something new in his arsenal. The thing with KSI is he hasn't really had anything remotely close to a challenge yet. He's mostly just fought first timers some of which he practically just picked off the street.  I guess most people aren't expecting him to win so if he loses Jake Paul will probably be next. to be honest, the only thing I can think of why KSI(same as Tommy Fury) took this fight is because it would generate a lot of money for them, I mean look at Jake Paul and Tommy Fury's fight both of them made millions from that fight.Quote from: hilariousandco on July 31, 2023, 06:58:40 PMDillan Danis is probably the prime candidate but I'm sure there's a few people they're trying to get and I'm sure they'll have a back up since he's notoriously flaky.I hope they pick a boxer if there is a boxer on their candidates to fight Logan Paul, I'd like to see him fight one. I know he already fought Mayweather but it was clearly a rigged match because there is no way an experienced boxer like Mayweather wouldn't knock out Logan Paul.

comments.author: Casdinyard
comments.body: Quote from: Beparanf on July 31, 2023, 02:52:19 PMTommy Fury is a real deal. He beats Jake in a convincing manner while KSI is inferior to Jake in terms of boxing skills. Tommy Fury boxing skills is superb like his brother. KSI is good if he is against same influencer boxer on his peers. I'm sure the odds on this match is very low for Fury which makes many gamblers do YOLO bet to KSI with juicy odds.  You can say that, but you also have to keep in mind that he's not that dedicated when it comes to training and preparing for fights, not to mention that he's taken a break which may have made him rusty over time but I still believe he'd put up a great fight, especially against KSI who never really had a dedicated boxing training as much as athletes do, maybe not even at the level of training that Jake Paul's subjecting himself these days. Still, I think Tommy's experience is more than enough to cover him for this fight, and given the fact that this is just a YouTuber boxing event and not really a title event it's making me think that none of them will take this as seriously as they would if honor is on the line.

comments.author: Ulven
comments.body: Quote from: Casdinyard on August 01, 2023, 09:58:52 PMQuote from: Beparanf on July 31, 2023, 02:52:19 PMTommy Fury is a real deal. He beats Jake in a convincing manner while KSI is inferior to Jake in terms of boxing skills. Tommy Fury boxing skills is superb like his brother. KSI is good if he is against same influencer boxer on his peers. I'm sure the odds on this match is very low for Fury which makes many gamblers do YOLO bet to KSI with juicy odds.  You can say that, but you also have to keep in mind that he's not that dedicated when it comes to training and preparing for fights, not to mention that he's taken a break which may have made him rusty over time but I still believe he'd put up a great fight, especially against KSI who never really had a dedicated boxing training as much as athletes do, maybe not even at the level of training that Jake Paul's subjecting himself these days. Still, I think Tommy's experience is more than enough to cover him for this fight, and given the fact that this is just a YouTuber boxing event and not really a title event it's making me think that none of them will take this as seriously as they would if honor is on the line. It is true that commitment and training are essential in boxing, and Tommy's break may have had an impact on his abilities. He might still do well in the battle, though, as experience can be a big factor. KSI's training history may not be as long as that of athletes, but his prior success in boxing competitions may be an asset. Since this is a boxing match between YouTubers!!!rather than a title match, the adrenaline could not be as high, which might change how they approach the bout. Watching how everything plays out will be intriguing.

comments.author: dothebeats
comments.body: Tommy Fury is on the money here for sure. KSI is a decent fighter, I'll give him that, but Tommy Fury managed to beat Jake Paul - an okay-ish fighter that proved to go against some of the (washed up) fighters that have made a name for themselves on their previous sports. I would love to see the lines for this, and see whether the bookies will favor Tommy Fury. If the odds between them are almost even, I'd pour my money out to Tommy Fury. Though if this is one of those fights that already has a winner decided even before the actual fight takes place, KSI will surely win. You'll never know in these kinds of events.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: This could be a tune fight for Tommy Fury because Jake Paul has one coming against Nate Diaz so if they win in their respective fight, there's going to be an interest for them to do it again and they can hype it, I'm sure Tommy and Jake Paul will try to win convincingly to get people interested in their rematch, especially Jake Paul who some people think won the fight, and of course, Tommy Fury wants to get even on the knockdown he suffers from Jake Paul.The potential Jake Paul - Tomy Fury fight will make people become interested in this fight, I hope KSI will give Tommy a good fight.

comments.author: Darker45
comments.body: I'm not particularly excited nor looking forward to this fight, but it seems the impression is that Tommy Fury knows a little boxing when he gave Jake Paul his first loss, albeit in an unconvincing SD. This and the stats of both men are probably the reasons why Tommy is the favorite at 1.40 while KSI is the underdog at 2.75. But despite the considerable age difference and height advantage which all favor the younger brother of Tyson, it seems KSI is athletic enough to give Fury a run for his money. And KSI has boxing background, too.

comments.author: Distinctin
comments.body: KSI has only got one win, and that was against Logan Paul, while Tommy Fury is the one who took down Jake Paul.It's shaping up to be quite an interesting match, but personally, I think Tommy Fury has the advantage in this one. The betting odds for this fight make it clear that Fury is the heavy favorite. You know how bookies usually get it right, so it looks like Fury is in a good position to take the win.QuoteTommy Fury Vs KSI OddsFighter   OddsTommy Fury   -334KSI   +250

comments.author: hilariousandco
comments.body: This has turned into an epic card as far as influencer boxing goes. It's pretty much got all the best "youtuber" fighters.QuoteFull Misfits Boxing Prime Card:    KSI vs Tommy Fury    Logan Paul vs Dillon Danis    Salt Papi vs Slim Albaher    King Kenny vs Anthony Taylor    Deen The Great vs Walid Sharks II    Astrid Wett vs Alexia Grace    Swarmz vs Ryan Taylor II    Chase DeMoor vs Tempo Arts    Whindersson Nunes vs My Mate Nate    S-X vs DTG    NichLmao and Alex Wassabi vs Luis Alcaraz Pineda and BDave (Tag Team)https://talksport.com/sport/boxing/1576376/misfits-boxing-prime-card-ksi-vs-tommy-fury-logan-paul-vs-dillon-danis/PPV price is £19.99 plus the regular dazn subscription.

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: I think we might see a Tommy Fury win over KSI and a Logan Paul win over Dillon Danis. Might have to bet the parlay on that one. I think if Tommy Fury held up to Jake Paul then he’ll beat KSI. I also don’t think Dillon Danis can box and if he shows up (which I sort of don’t think he’ll complete the fight without being disqualified somehow) I think Logan will end up winning by decision.
